metadata.title: DivideProject - Building custom web solutions that drive results
metadata.description: Unlock the potential of your digital presence with DivideProject. We specialize in crafting high-performance websites, mobile apps, and web apps using NextJS, React, and Tailwind CSS. Elevate your online impact with our cutting-edge solutions.

searchBar: What kind of project would be ideal?
What do I want to achieve?
projects.title: Quick journey of our latest projects
projects.paragraph: Hop on a visual tour of our latest projects, showcasing our expertise in web development and design. Discover innovation and quality in every step of our journey.

projectList.title: bezCV - online platform for recruiters and employees
projectList.desc: Hire and seek recruiters, everything done by our team, from design to functionality.

projectList.title: SmartTipz - online video platform for sharing and watching content
projectList.desc: Choose from the normal and business account. Explore videos and earn on uploading content through tipping system.

projectList.title: Case Study: Pricing Plans - four different layouts, one style guide
projectList.desc: Tailored pricing solutions designed to fit the client needs. Choose from the four distinct layouts based on the given style guide.

projectList.title: Flippify - our ultimate educational app for flashcards and notes
projectList.desc: Discover a whole new way of learning with Flippify. Seamlessly flip through interactive flashcards and access concise, organized notes on the go. Whether you're a student, professional, or lifelong learner, Flippify empowers you to master any subject with ease.

opinions.title: Relationship built on trust
searchBar: What values do I get from them?

opinionList.content: Collaborating with this team was a game-changer for our business. Their innovative approach to web development boosted our online presence and exceeded our expectations.
As a marketer, I highly recommend their UI/UX design services. The seamless user experience they created improved our website's performance and increased customer engagement.
They delivered the design as a pixel-perfect React app in just a couple of iterations that looked and felt good to play with. The components were all modular, full typed, and easy to understand.
I'm really impressed with the quality of work that DivideProject provides. They have an incredible eye for design and their attention to detail is second to none.

Great team. They followed the best practices for developement and completed the job in the given timeline. They are also very knowledgeable. They suggested some out of the box changes for the project to improve performance.
Back-end development was a critical aspect of our product, and their team delivered flawlessly. Their robust solutions ensured the scalability and security our business needed.

faq.question: What web development technologies do you specialize in?
faq.answer: We specialize in cutting-edge web development technologies, including Next.js, FastAPI, React, Tailwind CSS and more. Our expertise ensures high-performance, modern websites that are SEO-friendly.

faq.question: What is the typical timeframe for completing a web development project?
faq.answer: The project timeframe can vary depending on the scope and complexity of the project. We work closely with our clients to define realistic timelines and milestones. Once we understand your specific requirements, we can provide you with a tailored timeframe estimate.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance after the project launch?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your application or website continues to perform optimally. From regular updates and security patches to content management assistance, we are here to support your project's long-term success.

faq.question: Do you offer consultations?
faq.answer: Yes, we do offer consultations. Please contact us to discuss your requirements, and we can arrange a meeting at your convenience to further understand your needs and provide personalized solutions.

success.title: Thank you for registering!
success.paragraph: We will review your order along with the message you provided and respond as soon as possible!
